name: Ore tycoon-idle Mining game
description:
Who knows what is hidden in the depths of the mine?

Gold, ruby, huge diamonds...or it could be the worthless black stones, pity for that. Only the one who full of wisdom and luck will make big funtune.

So young man, dig through the whole universe, ready? go!

Guess what we have prepared for you?
Yeah, a mine without a master, a brand new excavation device as well as a group of diligent miners! Just move your fingers for a little click, they will be all belong to you.

What do you need to do?
"You need to use your wisdom and unparalleled mobility to start your mine work! Dig, transport, sell... what are you waiting for?
After first sale, hire some capable managers is necessary. Just a gently click, your order then will be done. with the automated operation, more and more benefits can be created.
Beware, the managers sometimes are loaf on the job，try to give them some warning.
Always remember, practice makes perfect. Good things are always hidden in the deepest! !"

What can you gain?
Monopolize the global mining industry? Become the ore king? Well, if these haven't appeal to you, then the Aced kill - planet expansion map is ready for you!

If your journey is the outer space, then how can a planet delay your footsteps? Why not expand your territory to the whole universe from now on?
